channel.title: Topic Titles
channel.description:
Whenever you post you should have your title name describing most of what you need, for example:
Topic Title: Compiling
Text: I need help with my compiler, anyone help?
When you do this it will attract more people to your post, otherwise it is wasting others time by clicking a topic that they do not know anything about. This will help alot and I did not find this in the rules so, thanks.
~Gription

item.title: Topic Titles
item.dc:creator: @Gription Gription
item.description:
@Gription wrote:

Whenever you post you should have your title name describing most of what you need, for example:
